name: with-mcp-apps
description: MCP Apps SDK Demo with multiple servers and chat client

scripts.dev: concurrently -n app,assets,pizzaz-node,kitchen-node -c green,cyan,blue,yellow "pnpm dev:app" "pnpm dev:assets" "pnpm dev:pizzaz-node" "pnpm dev:kitchen-node"
scripts.dev:all: concurrently -n app,assets,pizzaz-node,kitchen-node,pizzaz-py,kitchen-py,solar-py,shopping-py "pnpm dev:app" "pnpm dev:assets" "pnpm dev:pizzaz-node" "pnpm dev:kitchen-node" "pnpm dev:pizzaz-python" "pnpm dev:kitchen-python" "pnpm dev:solar-python" "pnpm dev:shopping-python"
scripts.dev:node-only: concurrently -n app,assets,pizzaz-node,kitchen-node -c green,cyan,blue,yellow "pnpm dev:app" "pnpm dev:assets" "pnpm dev:pizzaz-node" "pnpm dev:kitchen-node"
scripts.install-deps: pnpm install && cd client && pnpm install
scripts.install:all: pnpm install && (cd client && pnpm install) && (cd servers/pizzaz_server_node && pnpm install) && (cd servers/kitchen_sink_server_node && pnpm install)
